title: 97/349/EC: Commission Decision of 27 May 1997 amending the list of areas in industrial decline under Objective 2 as designated in Council Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 27 May 1997 amending the list of areas in industrial decline under Objective 2 as designated in Council Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88 (97/349/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 May 1997.
For the Commission
Monika WULF-MATHIES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 185, 15. 7. 1988, p. 9.
(2) OJ No L 337, 24. 12. 1994, p. 11.
(3) OJ No L 81, 24. 3. 1994, p. 1.

(5) OJ No L 193, 3. 8. 1996, p. 54.
